meanings.definition: A member of the United States Marine Corps.
meanings.sent1: The leathernecks trained hard to protect our country.
meanings.sent2: I have a cousin who is a leatherneck in the Marines.
meanings.sent3: The leathernecks had a barbecue and showed off their skills.
meanings.sent4: The leathernecks stood tall like guardians of the nation.
meanings.sent5: Seeing the leathernecks in uniform was truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: A tough, strong, or stubborn person.
meanings.sent1: My grandpa is a real leatherneck when it comes to fixing things.
meanings.sent2: She's a leatherneck when it comes to standing up for what she believes in.
meanings.sent3: The leatherneck refused to give up even when things got tough.
meanings.sent4: His leatherneck determination helped him overcome many obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The leatherneck's strength was unmatched in the competition.
